name: VR Meditation SkyRun
description: You are welcome to meditate and enjoy the atmosphere of peace and phantastic run of time in a silence high in mountains.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater Storage: 212 MB available space
